column14: REMUNERATION AND OTHER ENTITLEMENTS RELATING TO EXTERNAL STAFF
column20: Conditions of Employment of Other Servants of the European Union.
column22: Amount of assigned revenue in accordance with Article 21(2) and (3) of the Financial Regulation: p.m.
column23: This appropriation is intended to cover the effect of any salary adjustments made by the Council in the course of the financial year.
